channel.title: CVE Feed for Stephanie Leary -- Convert Post Types
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Stephanie Leary -- Convert Post Types

item.title: CVE-2024-32108|2024-04-11T12:56:26.373Z -- Stephanie Leary -- Convert Post Types
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Stephanie Leary Convert Post Types.This issue affects Convert Post Types: from n/a through 1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-31112|2024-03-31T18:56:40.660Z -- Stephanie Leary -- Convert Post Types
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Stephanie Leary Convert Post Types allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Convert Post Types: from n/a through 1.4.
